Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: DMISIU
Reviews.Content: Just bought it for my 7 y.o. Easy, great pics and 720p videos.For the price it takes good pics, easy to use, just a perfect next step for the kids.In fact if you are not pretending to be  "a pro" but want to shot some quick family /kids /situation photos and do not want to study the manual for 2 weeks, this camera takes much better pics/video/panoramas  than the smart phones, is small and light and you can just Point and Shot wihtout setting up things for 5 min first. So if you want something easy and really inexpensive -this one is a good one.I recomended for "non serious" photographer.99 y.o. grandma can operate it and take good shots of kids.If you are looking for $100 range camera-do not compare it to SLR...unless you find one for $100

Reviews.Title: Accepts SD cards! Includes DATE on pictures!
Reviews.Author: SN
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera 5 stars because it includes the DATEfunction which is hard to find nowadays.It's so cumbersome installing software and pastingdates on pictures.It is very low priced, in fact the picture qualitysurpasses units that cost triple.It takes pictures fast, has many features,but is easy to use.And yes this unit accepts SD cards!

Reviews.Title: Great picture with following settings
Reviews.Author: Nerazzurro
Reviews.Content: Hello I just received this camera as a gift, was really disappointed with picture quality, soft, blurry pictures most of the times, so spent a lot of hours checking settings before buying a new camera.. Found out that this camera produces crisp pictures, with following settings: REC mode, set it to Program Auto, Steady Shot Auto, ISO fixed manually to 100, all other settings can be left as default.Now ISO 100 will not capture far away images in low-no light scenario, but in my case I really do not care since most of my pictures are taken close to the actual object with proper or low light.I capture my images at 16:9 11M mode and it really looks good on both my PC monitor and my Plasma TV.So short story, do not use Intelligent Auto mode, it really does not work properly and probably is the reason this camera does not take crisp pictures all the times out of the box...

Reviews.Title: Good first Camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: As my title says this was the first digital camera that I purchased for my self, and for that reason it has suited me well.The camera is slim and compact and fits nicely and comfortably in my pant pockets.  The dark "slate" coloring is amazing (black oddly is my favorite color).  The camera comes with various fun settings that you can play around with.  I love shooting pictures with the "pop" setting which saturates the  colors.  There also is a setting that allows  you to take pictures with cool or warm coloring.  And finally there is a setting that allows the camera to take black and white photos extracting only a a certain color from the shot (only red, blue, green, or yellow objects/scenery will be in color).  These settings are fun and can cut out some of the editing down and add cool effects to your photos.  There is also a crop tool built right into the camera which is also a nice feature.  Finally the price is amazing, making this an affordable choice for anyone.Finally some of the draw backs that I have found with this camera.  First and foremost, many pictures turn out blurry.  This can be extremely frustrating.  Even with a steady hand or even a tripod and they still can come out blurry.  This especially occurs in low light settings, using the flash can help but only sometimes. I can almost forget about taking clear pictures at night. I find my self frequently having to retake and retake photos.  I've taken this to museums were this problem can be extremely frustrating.  The other problem I have noticed (which is my fault really) is that sometimes the 5X optical zoom just doesn't cut it. I occasionally wish I had purchased a camera with 10x or 20x zoom.Overall I do like this camera, but I am not in love with it.  I would recommend a Canon Coolpix over this camera for it's user-friendliness and it's ability to take quality pictures without motion blur.  After only having this camera for a little less then a year, I'm already on the market for a better one.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera, with features found on a video camera.
Reviews.Author: 15 Korinth "California girl on the loose."
Reviews.Content: The Sony Cyber-shot is a great point and shoot camera.  I've had several of the different iterations over the years.  I've also given one as a gift to my mom.  It's very easy to use with very nice results.  It's very difficult to get bad shots.  The video camera feature is a plus.  It does take video with ZOOM, sound and has photo capture (just like on the Sony video cam).  The varied body colors are a great alternative to boring black.  Its small enough to carry in your pocket or purse.  If you like the camera on your phone, but wish you had flash, better zoom, and clearer photos, the Cyber-shot would be a great camera for you.Edited February 26, 2013.***Yes, you do get the battery, a/c adapter charger, usb adapter that connects to your computer, and a starter memory card.  If you capture video with this camera, you might want to get a larger capacity memory card.  I've played around with the settings-- 4GB is about 30 minutes of video and 8 GB is about an 1hr which is perfect for filming a school assembly.  You could always transfer your output as needed to your computer, but having to do this more than once a day is a hassle especially when one is vacationing.***TIP, are your pictures coming out fuzzy?  1)  Are you taking the shots too close, not waiting for the flash, or making other amateur mistakes? 2) if not, then DO exchange the camera.  After having so many of these cameras and carrying them in my purse and dropping them, I have realized that the components just get out of whack after about a year or so.  The longer they are jostled, the more likely the pictures become fuzzy.  So if your pictures are fuzzy to begin with, return it for another one.I suppose that I could have taken my old cameras to a photo repair place.  I haven't bothered, because by then there was a newer and better camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: LUIS J CASTILLO Q
Reviews.Content: when you buy sony, you buy quality, very sharp fotos, great screen and super focus, i definitevly reccommend this camera, today they are a little higher price but it worth it

Reviews.Title: Not the best camera
Reviews.Author: D Maximo
Reviews.Content: Most people don't have an appreciation of good photography. Even if they like "good" pictures, they don't try to learn. They just want to point and click and be done with it. That being said, this camera has way too many features. I bought it for my elderly mother and she doesn't even use it. When I take pictures for her I have to remember how. I have to wait for the green light to stop flashing (essentially giving me a green light) and hold very steady till the camera finishes. But digital cameras are like that. Another problem I have with this camera is that it's too small. If you have big hands, it makes the use of this camera clumsy. My sister has used this camera with good results.  She has small hands. I would never buy this camera (or a like sized one) for myself. It just doesn't fit my hands and makes for clumsy handling and sometimes blurry pictures. I'm a pretty good photographer. People ask me for tips because they like the pictures I take. But this camera is just too small for me.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Dona Taherizadegan
Reviews.Content: the product is money worthy and works great! It arrived within the estimated time, less than one week, and the only things we had to purchase were the memory card and the case!

Reviews.Title: as expected.
Reviews.Author: ben gorter
Reviews.Content: good camera. simply meets expectations I had from Sony DSConly thing for improvement is the on/off button: its too sensitive

Reviews.Title: Replacement Camera
Reviews.Author: Don Jenkins
Reviews.Content: My ten year old camera, after years of faithful service,  gave up the ghost and repair would have cost more than a new so the search went on for a new one. I did not want a high end devise, just a simple point & shoot and maybe a bit better than a phone camera. I was amazed at the choices and the reasonable the prices.In the end I selected the Sony Cyber-shot, mainly because it had a built in re-chargeable battery and have not regretted it.Don

Reviews.Title: Some technical issues
Reviews.Author: Shlomo Katz
Reviews.Content: Generally seems like a good quality camera. But it certainly has issues.Specifically, the on/off button protrudes from the camera. I found that when I stored the camera in my pocket or a backpack, it would very frequently bump against some edge and turn itself on, opening the shutter. This probably made it more fragile and allowed dust/grease to enter the aperture or scratch the lens. It also wasted battery life and simply was annoying.Also, the need for an external battery charger is a minus, I didn't have it with me when I last needed it. However battery life is long.

Reviews.Title: Bought for a gift to replace a broken one.
Reviews.Author: Debra Burke
Reviews.Content: Came in new condition as promised.  Very happy to have gotten it as recipient knew how to use this particular camera.

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a gift.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Curtis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mother in law because it is easy to operate and use. She will be taking a trip to Austrailia and wanted a camera to capture her trip. I have this same camera and love it.

Reviews.Title: NO GOOD
Reviews.Author: brenda haley
Reviews.Content: Pictures are lousy, keeps turning on when button rubs on something, lens started not opening up without help, Zoom is blurry. Symbols are wearing off, and after one year it is dead. Won't work at all.

Reviews.Title: 3 years in, still working
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This little camera is decent for under $100. Not the highest quality camera out there. Have run into issues with it locking up on me from time to time where I have to take the battery out and put back to get it back working.I take 40-60 pictures per day with it for my job an have owned it for 3 years now. Buy a spare battery as it doesn't last long if you are taking a lot of shots.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Sally Groves
Reviews.Content: My second one like this.  Not as easy to use as the first one but still like it a lot

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot 14.1
Reviews.Author: Joyce A Robertson
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased to replace a Sony Cybershot 14.1 that was damaged by my husband running over my traveling bag with his van.  I thought I was purchasing an exact replacement, but This DSC-W620 is nowhere near as good as the DSC-W330, which takes better pictures even though it has been damaged.  Most of the pictures on this new camera turn out "double exposed" looking.  Too blury to keep, I end up deleting more pictures than I keep and I'm missing candid poses of grandchildren that can never be recaptured.  The back of my original Sony Cybershot 14.1 is red metal, the new Sony Cybershot 14.1 is black plastic.  The battery compartment opens differently and is the ONLY good thing about the new camera.  I will not buy another camera on line.  In store shopping only for me.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: broke
Reviews.Author: M. Jonas
Reviews.Content: Pictures were fine. Lots of good features but no lock. This camera constantly turned on in my pocket. Was annoying at first because I would pull it out and it already turned itself on and not being able to fully extend itself it would go into view mode thus draining the battery. After about a year of it turning itself on in my pocket but not being able to extend it finally broke. Would be a fine camera if it had a lock and didn't always want to turn itself on. My wife had it turn on if she left it in her purse also.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for cheap price
Reviews.Author: Jarisa
Reviews.Content: This camera may seem cheap, but the quality is so good people ask if I use an expensive professional camera!

Reviews.Title: Works great for work!
Reviews.Author: Angela W
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for pictures at work, and it is just as described!  Great for our purposes, and the price was right, too!

Reviews.Title: Wonderfull
Reviews.Author: David Fereira
Reviews.Content: The camera sony Cybert-shot is my little baby is cute awesome and have everything that i need, let do it

Reviews.Title: Loved it while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Kate McMurry
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for several years, and I loved it. I loved the color and appearance of it. I loved the small size, and most of all the great pictures it took. Unfortunately, it became unusable for a ridiculous reason. There is a tiny, plastic piece that holds the battery in the camera. The battery has to be removed regularly to be recharged. Over time, the little plastic piece became bent and eventually would not hold the battery in place any longer. Without the battery in place, the camera cannot work, and I was forced to junk it and get another camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for the amateur
Reviews.Author: Tiney
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for someone who simply wants to snap a picture here and there. It does have a slight delay in taking the picture (why I gave it a 4/5) so isn't very good for taking pictures of kids. Other than that small issue it's a great camera. The panorama function works well but you have to make sure to move the camera smoothly otherwise the picture will get choppy. It is a small camera so perfect for fitting into a pocket.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera!
Reviews.Author: Leopold Stotch
Reviews.Content: This little camera takes some great photos and video and I use it for my job. I am  getting  a second one.

Reviews.Title: If it moves, use movie mode!
Reviews.Author: AllyJ
Reviews.Content: Blurry shots abound if you are trying to capture anything moving faster than a turtle. Like a toddler. A slow moving hula dancer maybe. Got one or two of those. :-)  Had to use video mode for anything else, with inexplicable variation of quality, but mostly very clear. Great stills. Panoramics take a little bit of practice but turn out well once you get the hang of it. Overall it did an okay job as a last minute substitute for our much better Sony camera that decided to poop out right before our Hawaiian vacation. We used this with a $20 Polaroid underwater protecter box (purchased on Amazon) to snorkel and it worked well in movie mode, again, fish move! It gave us better pictures than we would have had with an underwater disposable with similarly slow shutter speeds and without movie mode capability. Menu fairly easy to navigate, instructions included but not actually all that helpful. Would make a good beginner camera. The variety of settings for tone variations is nice and you can see the difference more on your computer than you can on the camera's screen. Trust that there is a difference.

Reviews.Title: digital camer 5x
Reviews.Author: Diane L Miles
Reviews.Content: Love this camera it is great this is so easy to use with my rescue dogs would always use a camera like this for great pictures

Reviews.Title: Sony
Reviews.Author: Stacy Winemiller
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price.  Perfect for me.  Easy to use. Lightweight and easy to carry or throw in purse.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Michael Souffrant
Reviews.Content: my wife loves it and it is worth it for sure it is good and it takes the right pic

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: jimmy t. minato
Reviews.Content: very easy to use. nealy perfect. only setback is.. locking system. in my pocket, sometimes switch comes on without my intension. I want some kind of locking system when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Palmi
Reviews.Content: Good product for its price, It was a gift for my daugther and she is veryhappy with this product.

Reviews.Title: excellent product,
Reviews.Author: Jose Gauna
Reviews.Content: excellent product, good equipment, compact, great pictures, high quality video from a camera very good brand and quite complete with nothing to envy to other brands, very satisfied with the product

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Miguel Aguiar
Reviews.Content: el tiempo de entrega es super rapido y el producto de muy buena calidad los felcito y muchas gracias saludos

Reviews.Title: Many improvements to an already superior product
Reviews.Author: B. Lunt "Hawkeye"
Reviews.Content: This is the second version of this camera I have purchased. After several years the original seemed to be acting up and I thought it was dying, so I ordered the new version. Then a friend told me to put a tiny dab of Dieletric Grease on each of the three battery contacts, which I did (on the older camera) and it immediatky cleared right up. Now, both the new and old are working flawlessly, but the newer unit has better zoom and easier to use swithes. I love them both.

Reviews.Title: muy bien
Reviews.Author: roberto carlos
Reviews.Content: me gusto muchoesta muy buena la camaraes la primera que compro por este medio y me gusto la experiencia

Reviews.Title: wilfredo rojas
Reviews.Author: wilfredo
Reviews.Content: el producto es excelente me encanto, recomiendo al vendedor y el producto ampliamente, se cumplio con el tiempo estimado de envio

Reviews.Title: really nice
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: really nice, met my exceptions. its portable,, takes clear and sharp pictures, focusing is just perfect.its worth every cent i paid for it

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: It's a very good camera, not the best but it does its job. One thing is for sure, you'll need lots of storage space; each photo at 14 MP takes 5-6 MB...

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W620 14.1 MP
Reviews.Author: Alexis Vargas
Reviews.Content: excelente producto en buenas condiciones, bien empacado.sin detalles de traslado, recomendable el vendedor 100% original :)color y modelo pedido

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Real nice camera. I like the small size. Easy to carry. Get a good case to carry it in to protect it. Watch the on/off switch to make sure it doesn't accidently get turned on when you put it in your pocket. Overall it is real nice

Reviews.Title: buena compra
Reviews.Author: andruw16
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE.....MUY BUENA LA CALIDAD DE IMAGEN.. es muy facil de utilizar....y es sobretodo lo necesario para una buena camara..muy conforme

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Ana Maria Rengifo M
Reviews.Content: me encanto el producto y muy rapido el envio todo segun lo escrito lo unicoq eu la camara mo trae tarjeta de memoria

Reviews.Title: best buy
Reviews.Author: tromell
Reviews.Content: Firstly the rechargable battery caught my eyes im surprised that the camera was so cheap from sony for so many requirements. nice little pocket piece. the shell is a bit weak for my liking but the specs made it a 5 star cam all the way for the price

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W620
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price! The only set back for the camera is you have to buy a flash card separately . But a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: M. Vallone
Reviews.Content: Small and easy to handle. Nice resolution and zoom. I used it for potos outdoors and it served its purpose. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Numa Barquero "numa"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera, because is the one that is recommended to use with my Dermlite dermatoscope. It is very light, easy to use. The LCD display shows the images with clarity. The battery lasts long enough. It fits exactly with adapter that is provided to attach it to the dermoscope.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY - Terrible Camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph Bechtold
Reviews.Content: I haven't bought a digital camera for about 4 years until this one.  I assumed that with that much time passed it would be at least as good as my $200 Panasonic that I bought said 4 years ago.  Well let me tell you (as others have said in reviews) this camera is terrible!Even with people sitting still it still comes out blurry.  The colors are all washed out and the time to capture a picture seems like ages.  This camera is so bad I wouldn't spend $5 on it.  I thought Sony was a reputable company but I will never buy one of their products again after this purchase.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: MERH130
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A WONDERFUL CAMERA.  NOT SURE WHAT THE OTHER REVIEW PERSON IS TALKING ABOUT IT LOOKS LIKE A TOY. IT IS REALLY NICE SLIM AND HAS SO MANY NICE FEATURES. i BOUGHT THIS SO WHEN THE IPHONE 5 COMES OUT I DONT NEED IT.  I HAVE A 4 AND WANTED TO UPGRADE FOR THE CAMERA. SO I DECIDED THIS CAMERA IS JUST GREAT. LOVE THE ZOOM AND PANARAMIC MODE IS FUN. FOR A POINT AND SHOOT THIS IS GREAT.  I LOVE THIS CAMERA  I DONT THINK YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED. ITS GREAT FOR FAMILY FUN SHOTS AND TO HAVE A CAMERA AROUND .

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Amy Muir
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son for his birthday. It's ok, feels kinda cheap as in very thin, very light and almost feels like a toy. We've had trouble with the time lapse between shots and in low light it's virtually useless, to select a slower shutter speed and eliminate the need for the distraction of a flash. I've owned 4 other Sony DSC cameras and I wouldn't get this one again.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 4 months!
Reviews.Author: mommydearest
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good clear pictures, but can break very easy. It is made of cheap material. The lens got stuck and will not go back in. I have had other camera's, but they usually last a few years not a few months.

Reviews.Title: The WORST Sony product EVER - and Can't return it...
Reviews.Author: Well Being Abounds "Joyful One"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my friend for her birthday.... so She got to open it on the 25th of November... and now I find that it cannot be returned... It is blurry, it doesn't focus, it is cheaply made .. Just a shoddy product overall... I would not mind if it could be returned but they gave less than a month to see if the thing was JUNK... Save your money... NOT worth it at all... You can do better with a 5.00 point and shoot disposable!

Reviews.Title: What a POS
Reviews.Author: Terry Coleman
Reviews.Content: DO not buy this camera if you want to take ANY indoor photo's. I have tried every combo of setting and all I end up with is a fuzzy photo. Outdoor pic's are at best ok but indoor photos are a waste of time. The Sony W-330 I had before was a much better camera and I wish I could have found one to buy again...me bad for braking the first one...RUN FROM THIS CAMERA! I wish I have tried it more when it first arrived, then I could have return it, too late, no refund......

Reviews.Title: Excellent article
Reviews.Author: Alexander Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: An article of top quality and utility... An article of top quality and utility... and easy to use with quality materials for life and 100% recommended ...

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Herman Romero
Reviews.Content: The order arrived in perfect condition and almost on time, you have to try the product to see if it meets the expectations although at first glance shows quality

Reviews.Title: nery
Reviews.Author: Michel Moncayo
Reviews.Content: El producto llego en buenas condiciones, valió la pena la espera, y el producto es el que yo esperaba.los felicito gracias

Reviews.Title: fino
Reviews.Author: victor
Reviews.Content: calidad de mas , buen producto saludos, hasta la próxima compra de otros productos hasta luego bay bay calidad amigo

Reviews.Title: Excellent Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Carlos Orellana
Reviews.Content: This is a excellent camera of sony, the video resolution in 720p in HD it's very good, its easy for the use..

Reviews.Title: Todo muy bien
Reviews.Author: Rafael Leon
Reviews.Content: Buenas noches, me alegro por el tremendo regalo para mi esposa, espero que siempre cumplan de la misma manera. Muchas Gracias

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Evelin Peña Tovar
Reviews.Content: very good product that has exceeded my expectations. I hope other people have the opportunity to use it and have my experience

Reviews.Title: Ditto Britta
Reviews.Author: hairartjk
Reviews.Content: I experienced the same SLOW, blurry, washed out pics.  This is not a camera for a mom w/ a 2yr old. So glad It "accidently" got in the pool and we have buy a new one! ;)  husband thinks i soaked it on purpose cause Ive done nothing but complain and  poor quality pics for 4 months now!  Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W610 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Blue) (2012 Model)

Reviews.Title: this product was a gift for my best friend. I don't know nothing about camera, but my friend do, so i think that is a great prod
Reviews.Author: Jose Solis
Reviews.Content: this product was a gift for my best friend. I don't know nothing about camera, but my friend do, so i think that is a great product

Reviews.Title: Exlenete
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: Buena camara por el precio.Muy facil de manejar, ideal para fotos familiares o viajes.Tiene angular muy util para interiores y paisajes

Reviews.Title: price
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: price not stellar but camera is good. i am done with my review but it will not send until I type

Reviews.Title: Plastic and cheap
Reviews.Author: lilybb
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to see such a great price for a sony camera. I was very disappointment to seethe low quality material to make the camera. The Black body of the camera is plastic, feels like a toy camera- it's so light. If you were to drop it, the plastic is so cheap it would probably chatter into many pieces.  I prefer a more durable camera.

Reviews.Title: okay... camera
Reviews.Author: MultiDesigner
Reviews.Content: this camera is very light weight. Great features but is still quite limited. I couldnt deal with the airy feel that resembled a toylike camera.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: yo
Reviews.Content: I'm trying this item right now, I think is very good but I need to try it  alittle more ,

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Denis
Reviews.Content: El articulo de la cámara y estuche Muy bueno, se recibió en buen estado y a la fecha establecida sin ningún retraso

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: B Taylor
Reviews.Content: I bought the cyber shot  dsc-w330 about a year ago. Very slow!! I lose a lot of great pictures because it is so slow and I have small children who don't hold still for long. Poor quality photos and washed out colors. Everytime i get my photos developed i want to scream because they are such poor quality. The only good thing I can say is it's inexpensive and easy to carry. It fits easily in a pocket or purse.I don't know if this cyber shot model is any better but I will never purchase another cyber shot again. I am writing this review today because I am online searching for a new camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1 megapixels
5X Optical Zoom
2.7 inch LCD
Capture your videos in 720p HD Movie mode
Take stunning images in Sweep Panorama mode-up to 360°
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W620 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Red) (2012 Model)
